org.ujorm.tools.web.table

Class TableBuilder<D>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ujorm.tools.web.report.ReportBuilder
      • org.ujorm.tools.web.table.TableBuilder<D>
  • Deprecated. 
    Uset the ReportBuilder class rather.

    @Deprecated
public class TableBuilder<D>
extends ReportBuilder
    A HTML page builder for table based an AJAX.
    Please note that this is an experimental implementation.

    Usage

      TableBuilder.of("Hotel Report")
          .add(Hotel::getName, "Hotel", NAME)
          .add(Hotel::getCity, "City", CITY)
          .add(Hotel::getStreet, "Street")
          .build(httpServletRequest, httpServletResponse, resource);
